name: core
description: This is the core fetish. It effectively defines the language. You do not need to manually include it.

operators.name: spank
operators.description: Subtract the RHO from the LHO

operators.name: worship
operators.description: Multiply the LHO with the RHO
examples: Have Amanda worship Bruce's throbbing cock

operators.name: flog
operators.description: Divide the LHO by the RHO

operators.name: lick
operators.description: Add the RHO from the LHO

operators.name: tickle
operators.description: Set the LHO to the remainder of the LHO divided by the RHO

operators.name: scream
operators.description: Assign RHO to LHO, with new line

operators.name: torture
operators.description: Read the next byte from RHO and place it into LHO

operators.name: hogtie
operators.description: Concat RHO as fraction to LHO

code.reference/chain: --this should never enter the C code--

comparison_operators.name: is
comparison_operators.description: Return true if LHO==RHO, else return false

comparison_operators.name: is not
comparison_operators.description: Return true if LHO!=RHO, else return false

comparison_operators.name: is submissive to
comparison_operators.description: Return true if LHO<RHO, else return false

comparison_operators.name: is dominant towards
comparison_operators.description: Return true if LHO>RHO, else return false

builtins.name: saint andrew
builtins.description: Chain version of argv with arguments separated by `zero`, intended to be invoked as `Saint Andrew's Cross`
